channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 美联储偏好的基础通胀指标在 2 月份可能仍处于令人不安的高位，这表明央行行长对过早降息持谨慎态度的原因所在

item.title: 联邦调查局监控了世界顶级石油交易商长达数年的贿赂计划，揭露了全球大宗商品交易中的腐败现象。我们有录音带

item.title: 哈尔科夫正面临因俄罗斯周五向乌克兰发射导弹而造成的供水、供暖和供电短缺，公用事业服务可能要到周一才能完全恢复。
item.description:
Kharkiv is facing water, heating and power shortages caused by a Russian missile barrage on Ukraine on Friday, and utility services may not be fully restored until Monday https://t.co/9wCyvbOP55

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 奢侈品零售商 Matches 的困境是一个最新迹象，表明在消费者消费疲软的背景下，零售商的困境正在大西洋两岸蔓延。
item.description:
Luxury retailer Matches’ woes are the latest sign that retailers’ troubles are spreading across the Atlantic amid weaker consumer spending https://t.co/4qo14JHhtz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将于 4 月访华，与中国高层领导人会晤。
item.description:
Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will visit China in April to meet with the country’s senior leaders, Politico reported https://t.co/JK3dgQSY0L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 尽管财政和货币当局正在制定新的货币改革计划，津巴布韦仍计划保留今年每个交易日都在贬值的本币。
item.description:
Zimbabwe plans to keep its local dollar which has lost value every single trading day of the year, even as fiscal and monetary authorities work on new plans to revamp the currency https://t.co/UEa8DjXiam

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统签署了一项1.2万亿美元的拨款方案，使美国政府得以继续运行至9月30日，避免了政府部分停摆的局面
item.description:
President Joe Biden signed a $1.2 trillion funding package that keeps the US government running through Sept. 30, averting a partial government shutdown https://t.co/afqQTTIkIh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/EuczmclVb7

item.title: 花旗在纽约的股票部门遭到骚扰指控，棉花大王发生了什么事，比特币挖矿电脑老了去哪里？以下是周六美国简报。
item.description:
Citi's equities unit in New York is hit with allegations of harassment, what happened to King Cotton and where do Bitcoin mining computers go when they get old? Here's your Saturday US Briefing. https://t.co/fvdFOpH45i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 国内对棉花的需求正在持续下降。在 2023 年最后五个月关闭了八家纺织厂后，美国只剩下约 100 家纺织厂
item.description:
Domestic demand for cotton is on an unrelenting decline. After eight mills closed in the last five months of 2023, only around 100 are left in the US https://t.co/QT7qspQdXq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 美国大约 6000 台老式比特币挖矿机不久将被闲置，并被送往科罗拉多斯普林斯的一个仓库，在那里它们将被重新刷新，并转售给希望在低成本环境中挖矿获利的海外买家。
item.description:
About 6,000 older Bitcoin mining machines in the US will soon be idled and sent to a warehouse in Colorado Springs where they’ll be refreshed and resold to buyers overseas looking to profit from mining in lower-cost environs https://t.co/hSOnAGCVlv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
item.description:
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists are sticking with their year-end S&P 500 forecast level of 5,200, but have a scenario in which tech megacaps lead the index up another 15% https://t.co/FYkrs1kVvK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: Chipotle 历史性的股票分拆方案凸显了今年牛市的巨大魅力，显示了这家快餐连锁店必须付出巨大努力，才能让那些喜欢其平价卷饼的人买得起其股票。
item.description:
Chipotle's historic stock-split proposal spotlights the enormity of this year’s bull run by showing the lengths the fast-food chain must go to bring its shares within reach of those who enjoy its affordable burritos https://t.co/OyHSXyh1ZI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 波兰央行行长的副手表示，他不会在议会调查期间卸任

item.title: 根据采访，花旗集团的同事在办公室吸食可卡因，以长相评价同事，并盯着女性的身体看。在单位内部，存在着一种被忽视的粗野和权利模式。
item.description:
Citi cohort used cocaine at the office, rated coworkers by looks and stared at women’s bodies, according to interviews. Inside the unit, there has been a pattern of boorishness and entitlement that’s been ignored. https://t.co/1J66ZDvCmH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 对于各国央行来说，本周是重要的一周，尤其是日本央行，它结束了负利率制度，这是世界上最后一个负利率制度。周末阅读
item.description:
It was a big week for central banks and especially the Bank of Japan, which ended its negative interest rate regime, the world’s last. Here’s your Weekend Reading https://t.co/VVFcmlleIa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024

item.title: 人们期待习近平做出大胆改革开放的承诺，这反映出人们越来越担心每个人都要退出市场--这就是所谓的 "卖中国 "论调。
item.description:

item.title: 在错过泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的世界巡回演唱会之后，泰国已与夏日音速（Summer Sonic）和明日世界（Tomorrowland）音乐节达成主办协议，以推动以活动为导向的旅游业发展。
item.description:
After missing out on Taylor Swift’s world tour, Thailand has sealed deals to host Summer Sonic and Tomorrowland music festivals as it pushes event-driven tourism https://t.co/dIHYn1hSd1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 23, 2024
